\varphi = \frac{1 + \sqrt{5}}{2} \hspace{12ex} \psi = \frac{1 - \sqrt{5}}{2}

\\[5ex]

S = \sum_{i=1}^{k}\frac{{\varphi^{3i}} - \psi^{3i}}{\sqrt{5}}

\\[3ex]

\phantom{x} \hspace{0.2ex} = \frac{1}{\sqrt{5}} (\sum_{i=1}^{k}(\varphi^3)^i - \sum_{i=1}^{k}(\psi^3)^i)

\\[3ex]

\phantom{x} \hspace{0.2ex} = \frac{1}{\sqrt{5}} (\varphi^{3} \frac{1-(\varphi^3)^k}{1-\varphi^3} - \psi^{3}\frac{1-(\psi^3)^k}{1-\psi^3})

\\[8ex]
